actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that an individual who has completed 30 years of railroad service shall be deemed to have a current connection with the railroad industry for the purposes of such act.

summary.text: Provides that an individual who has completed 30 years of railroad service shall be deemed to have a current connection with the railroad industry for purposes of annuity eligibility under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that an individual who has completed 30 years of railroad service shall be deemed to have a current connection with the railroad industry for the purposes of such act.
